verbose_text: In this study, we found that TBC1D8 gene is amplified in OVCA tissues, resulting in the up-regulation of TBC1D8 mRNA and protein levels, and TBC1D8 impedes the tetramerization of PKM2 to suppress its PK activity and promote aerobic glycolysis and tumorigenesis in OVCA.
evidence: TBC1D8 impedes the tetramerization of PKM2 to suppress its PK
